gameDetail:
【Introduction】

Explore the deep sea underwater kindom!
Countless marine creatures to capture!
Various land monster and deep sea monsters to challenge!
Treasure hunt in the deep sea, dig deep into the mine for countless gems!
Turn deserted islands into your own kindom with your friends!



【Features】

-Freedom to build your own island
Experience the fun of extream survival on deserted islands 
Grow various crops, be a farmer
Get you mining picks to collect resources and forge them into various blocks 
Build your own Marine kindom with the resources you collected


-Abundant Sea creatures

In the mysterious deep sea area, dancing with fishes in coral thicket
Don't not get attracted by the glowing deep sea jellyfishes, watch out their venomous tentacles 
Blow the conch Shell might summon dolphins, blue whales, even giant whales that are able to fly to the edge of sky
Be sure to not get hurt in deep sea, because that will attract the bloodthirsty sharks 



-Unlimited mining resources

No matter it's at the buttom of the sea or mining area, unlimited minerals are waiting for you
Call your friends to get your mining picks and enjoy the harvest
Or get your weapons ready and rob the items from other players



-Challenge various monsters

Deep sea sleeping giant Cthulhu  
Giant octopus: the master of camouflage
The savage one-eyed captain
Giant Orc the honorous warrior
...

Switching various weapons, and make critical strikes to win lavish items!
